website_summaries.verdict: Durable and easy to use, this salad spinner offers the greatest value for the lowest price.
pros: Dual pouring spouts and a long handle
cons: Smaller capacity (best for one or two people)

customer_reviews.title: Junk.  So sad.  Goodbye $18.
customer_reviews.text: This salad spinner was delivered less than six weeks ago. The little screw holding the two top pieces together has already come out and really can't be fixed. Even more distressing, the nut holding the little screw was in my serving of salad. Glad I saw it before ingesting it. This is a shoddy item, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: dowagerton

customer_reviews.title: Great size, and works well!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I'd wanted! A smaller sized salad spinner that doesn't require a lot of storage space, yet large enough for spinning lettuce for 2-3 people. So far I've only spun lettuce from 1 romaine heart lettuce head (enough for 2 people) at a time, but it looks as if it can fit double that amount. Need to make a large salad, no problem - just use it twice! Tip: you can also use it for washing and drying fresh herbs. Wish I'd bought this a long time ago!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works. A bit concerned about its lifespan.
customer_reviews.text: It's a salad spinner. Not a lot to say. My only gripe is it seems to be pretty easy to grind the gears inside it if you have it loaded up pretty heavily. Start slow... There is a nut on the inside of the lid that seems awfully loose, but can't be tightened. It hasn't come off yet, and it works. I'm just concerned about the long-term reliability. That said- it works, and I love the size which is perfect for 1-2 people. Other spinners I have purchased are just too big.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf I. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Works great and a decent price
customer_reviews.text: I used this spinner for the first time today, spinning cherries after I had soaked then in water, vinegar and baking soda (to get them really clean). The spinner is simply designed, turning the handle to do the spinning. It removes the water pretty fast. I'm now storing the cherries inside the spinner in the fridge. The spinner basket also doubles as a colander, which is nice. Great for one or two persons.
customer_reviews.author: brucereck

customer_reviews.title: Nice, useful help
customer_reviews.text: I had salad spinners for a long time, but stopped doing lettuce salad. What re-awakened me to this valuable helper was my wanting to have fresh spinach in the house that was more easily washed for cooling and keeping in the refrig. It's quite nice and of good value.
customer_reviews.author: ABM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and Easy to store

And as many reviewers have said, you get always spin more that one batch if you need more. Spins greens dry.
customer_reviews.author: P. Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Read return policy carefully.
customer_reviews.text: I am thoroughly disappointed with this company's return policy and I would advise other potential consumers to read it thoroughly. It is highly egregious...almost half the cost was kept by the company even though the item was returned in original, new condition. I would not buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Good design, size ok for 1 person

customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a salad. Easy to store, and so easy to clean.

customer_reviews.author: Preston Scott

customer_reviews.title: Works great!

customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great little spinner for single cook

When the colander is filled with salad ingredients, it makes enough for about 2 servings - so I think this would be a great choice for couples as well. The pot-handle on the side and the pour spout makes it extremely easy to handle and makes clean up a breeze. It's easy to rinse out in the kitchen sink and set it out to dry on the dish drainer - where it's ready to go for the next day. Very glad I made this purchase... definitely healthier eating for me! (I ate 3 salads today.)
customer_reviews.author: A Marshall

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect product for drying lettuce.

I love that dressing doesn't get watered down if you serve salad soon after washing. I like that I don't have to dry it with paper towels which have chemicals in them, or dish towels which could have chemical residue from detergent or softeners. I am pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mea Bluebird

customer_reviews.title: Good not great

customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey WXXX

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only salad spinner I've ever owned, ha ha, and I love it! I use it for fruit too. Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: 10 STARS  !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  :) :) :)

People who nit pick this little gadget dont know what they talking about. I think it is wonderful. I am going to send this as Christmas presents this year. I bought the salad saver but I need to use it for awhile before I review it. I am tickled pink.

customer_reviews.title: Stop pestering me for reviews.

It helps to really soak the lettuce, veggies, etc. down as much as possible, but I might look into buying a larger one for the future.

I've only had it 5 days and have used it 4 times not counting the salads I'll make later today.

Now I am very selective in picking my greens, just enough to fill this spinner, all to be eaten the same day they are picked. It does an excellent job of getting the water out, aided by the pour spouts. It then keeps the greens fresh in that same container until its time to mix up a little salad magic

I am very pleased and would recommend this to anyone who needs a salad spinner.
customer_reviews.author: zGranna

customer_reviews.author: K. Wilson

Also I did not like the fact that the outer bowl is solid and does not let the water run out. You have to pour it out. I prefer the type with the perforated outer bowl and larger hole in the top. You water let the water from the faucet run in the top while the lettuce is spinning, and the water runs out the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Joan L

That brand is no longer available, but this one works just as well and I expect to get many years of frequent use from it. Highly recommended, and it does not take up as much space as the big ones.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do with no problems
customer_reviews.text: I took a ten dollar gamble on this small salad spinner not sure of what I was going to get. To my surprise and delight my gamble paid off because this item is not only well made but it actually works. It's only big enough to prepare enough salad for two people so keep that in mind. You won't be dissapointed with this purchase so if you're thinking of buying it then do it.
customer_reviews.author: NY Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: The spinner is not big and bulky like some. Love the handle. Great for holding onto when spinning. The pouring spouts are helpful. It's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Petersen

customer_reviews.title: best for a single salad eater
customer_reviews.text: This spinner does the job, and it's easy enough to take care of, but do note the dimensions: it is quite small. We often wind up filling and spinning repeatedly in order to prepare enough salad greens. If you're not a single, you might want to consider spending more in order to be able to get the job done in one go.
customer_reviews.author: N. Tinker

customer_reviews.title: but overall a good product and it does spin the salad as advertised
customer_reviews.text: If I could have fit two more lettuce leaves in this contraption I would have given it five stars but since I had to do it twice in one night, I was exhausted. Sometimes the lettuce blends in too well with the strainer thing and some is left behind, but overall a good product and it does spin the salad as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis K

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this salad spinner! Easy to use and stores easily.
customer_reviews.author: Scott L.

customer_reviews.title: The WOW Salad Spinner!
customer_reviews.text: Over many years, I have not been big on salads until I purchased the Salad Spinner from Amazon. Over the past weeks, I have used the Spinner every single day and it is a must in my daily food intake. I have purchased an array of lettuce products - no more bagged products - and even into Organic products. They have none of that wax-like taste as I had tried to eat before. This is a real winner for me.
customer_reviews.author: Judie Kopfman

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Good size for two adult salads.
customer_reviews.author: Pierson S.

customer_reviews.title: great little spinner
customer_reviews.text: It is a smaller spinner - a size of a regular strainer. The handle and the groves are allowing you conveniently remove water without opening the spinner. And then you can spin again. It jumps on the counter just like other cheaper and less heavier spinners. But for the price, it is a great spinner for everyday salads for two (or two adults and 2 kids).
customer_reviews.author: Ekat

customer_reviews.title: GREAT to have in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Looove having a small salad spinner. This one is really good quality too, for the price. It seems pretty durable and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Sly Cann

customer_reviews.title: Great for one woman kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Small, easy to store, perfect for single large salads. I also use it to rinse other fruits and veggies.
customer_reviews.author: susan stewart

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: And easy to clean. Capacity is on the small side.
customer_reviews.author: Sandikat

customer_reviews.title: Life Changer
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best purchase. No more wet spinach!
customer_reviews.author: Haylie

customer_reviews.title: Great little spinner
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for a small salad. Easy to clean and lightweight to handle while cleaning as well. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren L

customer_reviews.title: flimsy
customer_reviews.text: very flimsy it opens when spinning letting veggies out only good for herbs. i had an oxo spinner that i lost that was way superior i tried to save some money but i will probably have to purchase an oxo one again
customer_reviews.author: ale

customer_reviews.title: Product only lasted for 4 months before falling apart
customer_reviews.text: This salad spinner fell apart after 4 months. The two parts that make up the lid detached spontaneously. I've tried everything to put them back together, but it is not possible to reattach them. The spinning motion does not work with these two parts detached. Note: I didn't drop it or mistreat it in any way, I'm careful with my stuff. The lid broke apart in my hands, while I was cleaning it out.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly useful!
customer_reviews.text: I used to see these advertised and thought they were silly - but that was when I rarely ate salad. When I switched to a different kind of diet with a lot more salads, I broke down and ordered this. Turns out it is really terrific. You can get fairly dry lettuce in a matter of seconds.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on the recommendation of America's Test Kitchen. I had a lot of people say that they don't like salad spinners because they break easily. This one does not! I've used this one to the limit and it has held up. I highly recommend this salad spinner.
customer_reviews.author: B. Brown

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: for a single person is enough! I just cut half a lettuce which is enough for me during the week for my salads very easy to use and sturdy 🙂
customer_reviews.author: yocelin reyna

customer_reviews.title: Salad Spinner
customer_reviews.text: Item is as described. Nice to have a method by which to dry leafy salad fixings after hand washing. When I purchase bagged lettuce, I will soak the leafy items first then drain the water and spin until all excess water is removed. Very pleased with item.
customer_reviews.author: DAR

customer_reviews.title: Right Size
customer_reviews.text: Very handy to use, just the right size for 2 people. Handle makes it easy to spin.
customer_reviews.author: Buzzy
